description:
I crafted a simple miniature foam house. Never thought about using cardboard as roof before, it seems to work. Check out the Cheap Tabletop Terrain Tutorial Playlist for more: https://tinyurl.com/y2xm9c4x

The removable roof makes this piece more playable, and it is possible to add an extra floor using wooden platforms from one of my other videos. https://youtu.be/437p1gwNNuE
tags: how to craft a foam house
title: Crafting a Miniature Foam House (D&D Terrain Tutorial)
